meanings.sent1: The knight showed great doughtiness in facing the dragon.
meanings.sent2: She admired his doughtiness when he stood up to the bully.
meanings.sent3: The doughtiness of the tiny mouse facing the cat was quite surprising.
meanings.sent4: Her doughtiness in speaking up for what was right inspired others.
meanings.sent5: The doughtiness of the firefighter rushing into the burning building was truly heroic.

meanings.sent1: His doughtiness in training for the marathon paid off on race day.
meanings.sent2: The team's doughtiness in the final minutes led them to victory.
meanings.sent3: The doughtiness of the ant carrying the heavy leaf impressed the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: The doughtiness of the old tree withstanding the storm was remarkable.
meanings.sent5: Her doughtiness in pursuing her dreams never wavered.

meanings.sent1: The explorer's doughtiness in venturing into the unknown was legendary.
meanings.sent2: She faced the challenge with doughtiness and determination.
meanings.sent3: The cat's doughtiness in confronting the dog surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: His doughtiness in skydiving without hesitation amazed his friends.
meanings.sent5: The doughtiness of the young soldier in battle was truly admirable.
